We went on 2 fieldtrips, did a ton of in-class activities, and had many discussions. Attendance is mandatory, and even 1 unexcused absence is half a letter grade deficit. GREAT TEACHER!

summary_comment: This professor is highly regarded for her passion and ability to make classes engaging, despite the length of the sessions. She encourages student participation and guidance, fostering an interactive learning environment. Her grading is fair, and she has an excellent graduate teaching assistant (GTA) who contributes positively to the class. Overall, students find her instruction both valuable and enjoyable.

Ratings.comment: She's a great instructor but you have to participate in class discussions to keep the momentum going. The class period is long but is more than bearable with such a passionate and eye-opening teacher.
Great GTA! The class is awesome!
Extremely helpful and friendly. She allows the students to guide the class, which is nice.
She's a pretty good teacher. She keeps the class interesting, even though it's a long class period. She grades very fairly.
Excellent GTA - I'd recommend her.

summary_comment: Based on the available student comments, it appears that the professor in question has not yet received any feedback, suggesting either a new position or a lack of recent courses taught.

Ratings.comment: No Comments

summary_comment: The professor is highly regarded for their teaching quality, described as easy and fair with a focus on student success. They are known for their helpfulness, engaging activities, and fair grading. Students appreciate the supportive environment and the teacher's dedication to ensuring understanding. The professor also values communication, responding promptly to emails. Overall, the professor is consistently praised for their positive impact on the learning experience.

Ratings.comment: Very very easy class as long as you attend. All the papers can be rewritten and regraded. No tests. Gives long articles and the book to read, but I never really read any of it. Great teacher too, very helpful.
Great Teacher, Fun Class. Puts a lot of thought into activities and we watched The Office. Fair grader, provides feedback on papers and brought food for class.  Definitely Recommend.
Awesome teacher, really fair grader, very nice too.  Makes sure you know what you are doing and that you're not lost.

She has some really unique activities and definitely puts in a lot of effort to try and make the class fun. She is not difficult, very fair, if you put in the time you will do well. Very helpful and nice too and she gets back to e-mails in a very timely fashion. Really cool teacher.

summary_comment: The professor is known for being one of the easier instructors, with a focus on attendance and consistent participation. Students note that showing up and doing the work reliably leads to high grades, though some find the class content somewhat boring. The professor is described as friendly and willing to allow paper rewrites, though there is a perception of having favorites among students. Overall, while the class is considered easy, it requires active engagement to succeed.

Ratings.comment: one of the easiest classes i have had, she has favorites, if you show up to class and do your work, she will give you an A. Class is kinda boring but it is easy, save all your papers because she collects them the last day of class. Also attendance is required, if you miss one class she takes 1/2 letter grade off your final grade.
I loved this class! She is somewhat challenging.  You won't be able to go to class and just sit there, must participate.  Not to tough of a grader.
easiest A i have EVER recieved. She had favorites and the class is boring.
Class is boring but she is very nice and real easy.
She was a friendly teacher. Let you rewrite your papers if you're not satisfied with the grade you received.

summary_comment: The professor is knowledgeable and helpful, particularly in answering specific questions related to Photoshop. However, students find his grading subjective and tough, often focusing on artistic merit over effort or time spent. There is confusion regarding grading criteria, and some students suggest taking the class with another instructor. Overall, while the professor is respected for his expertise, his teaching style may not align well with the needs of non-art majors in a general education course.

Ratings.comment: No clear grading guidelines. Using your own photography became more important than photoshop itself, which isn't even a pre-understood aspect of the class.  He has unclear expectations as to how your projects should look and is a tough grader.  Bad combo, especially in a "subjective" GEC art class for non-art majors.  Take it with someone else.

Aaron knows a lot, is really nice, and I learned a lot about photoshop from him, but he is a really tough grader. He looks at everything you do from an artistic standpoint, rather than work/time/effort, when it's a GEC of non-art majors. Enjoyed the class, not necessarily him so much.

Unlike other art ed teachers, aaron grades you based on how good at art you are, rather than giving you credit for presenting a project with a sufficient amount of time and effort put into it.  Not a nice guy would not recommend ever. not sure which aaron knochel the guy below me had but i'd like to take his class.

Arron, is a great prof. he fully understands his subject matter and is very helpful if you have a specific question.  For this class it says a book is required but, i never used mine and never saw a single one in class, any help you need is online.

summary_comment: The professor is highly regarded for their engaging and informative teaching style, making the class both interesting and enjoyable. They provide clear assignments and guidelines, ensuring students understand what is expected. Mandatory attendance is strictly enforced but does not detract from the positive learning environment. The class incorporates various interactive elements such as discussions, videos, and activities, enhancing the educational experience. Students consistently praise it as one of the best classes they have taken.

Ratings.comment: Really interesting class, really helpful teacher. Assignments were very clear and you did well as long as you followed the guidelines, which were clear. Attendance is mandatory, but not a class that you would dread going to. Lots of class discussions, videos, and activities. Overall, really great experience and one of the best classes I have taken!
